articles.description: OnePlus Nord 3 5G OxygenOS 14 Closed Beta Testing (CBT) programme is now open for users in India, the company announced on the OnePlus Community forum on Monday. Under the initiative, 500 users will be selected for the short-term beta testing programme.
articles.content: OnePlus Nord 3 5G was launched in India in July with a Snapdragon 7+ Gen 2 SoC under the hood. The OnePlus Nord 2T successor shipped with the company's Oxygen OS 13.1 skin based on the Android 13 ope… [+2214 chars]
